snippet: Vodafone’s stake in Verizon Wireless may be worth $120 billion. If a deal can be reached with Verizon, the big question is what strategic options the British telecommunications would pursue with such a windfall.
abstract: Vodafone’s stake in Verizon Wireless may be worth $120 billion. If a deal can be reached with Verizon, the big question is what strategic options the British telecommunications would pursue with such a windfall.

headline.main: Why Vodafone Should Head for a Verizon Exit
